holographic.name: Holographic Will
holographic.description: Must be entirely written and signed by your own hand
requirements: Must be written entirely in your own handwriting
Must be signed with your own signature
No witnesses required in most jurisdictions
Must be in local language or translated
advantages: No witnesses needed in most places

witnessed.name: Witnessed Will
witnessed.description: Can be typed or written by another person, requires witnesses
requirements: Must be signed by testator in presence of witnesses
Witnesses must sign in testator's presence
Number of witnesses varies by jurisdiction (usually 2-3)
Witnesses must be legally capable adults

forcedHeirs.description: Most common law jurisdictions allow free disposition of assets

methods: Creating a new will that explicitly revokes previous ones
Physical destruction of the will with intent to revoke
